Text: The Kingdom of Croatia (Latin: "Regnum Croatiae" ; Croatian: "Kraljevina Hrvatska, Hrvatsko Kraljevstvo" ) was a medieval kingdom in Central Europe comprising most of what is today Croatia (without most of Istria and some Dalmatian coastal cities), as well as most of the modern-day Bosnia and Herzegovina.
